addRecipe.description-detail: Adds a new recipe titled "Fry Rice" with "Rice" as the ingredient to the app\'s recipe list.

configureSeasonalCalendar.description-detail: Sets the app\'s region to North America and language to English for personalized seasonal recipe content.

accessSupportPage.description-detail: Navigates the user to the app\'s support page via the navigation drawer.

addCategory.description-short: Add a new category named Lunch
addCategory.description-detail: Adds a new category named "Lunch" to the app\'s category list.
